name: CSS
format:
<style id="custom-styles">
   
.multistate-switch-alike-button > button {
    background-color: var(--nr-dashboard-widgetColor);
    top: 15% !important;
    left: 15% !important;
    border-radius: 2em;
    width: 70% !important;
    height: 70% !important;
    outline: 1px solid var(--nr-dashboard-widgetColor);
    outline-offset: 4px;
    color: white;
}
.multistate-switch-alike-button > button:focus {
    outline: 1px solid var(--nr-dashboard-widgetColor) !important;
    outline-offset: 4px !important;
}
.multistate-switch-alike-button > button i {
    vertical-align: unset; 
    width: unset;
}
.multistate-switch-alike-button > button > span{
   position: absolute;
   top: 50%;
   left: 50%;
   transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
}
</style>
